dct_title_s: Chart of the Canton River with the entrances & islands
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:304,128. (E 112째55'--E 114째47'/N 23째10'--N 21째50'). Shows depths and hazards to navigation. Also shows"Actions fought [in 1841] by the British and Chinese." Covers Macao, Hong Kong, and Canton. Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. Inset map: Plan of the City of Canton. Scale [approximately 1:25,334]. Ancillary map shows the coast of Asia from the Bay of Bengal to the Sea of Japan.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
